stimulusHtml: The cadence ending the fanfare includes a secondary leading-tone seventh chord that tonicizes Ⅴ. What voice-leading feature is present?

features.html: The following question is based on a fanfare you will hear played by a trumpet choir. The example includes two secondary leading-tone chords.

choicesHtml: The seventh of the leading-tone chord resolves to the third of the tonicized chord.
The fifth of the leading-tone chord prepares a Ⅴ4-3 cadential pattern.
The third of the leading-tone chord is suspended to create a Ⅴ6/4-5/3 pattern.
The root of the leading tone chord becomes the fifth of the tonicized chord via voice exchange.
